name: Acular
indications: acular indicated temporary relief ocular itching due seasonal allergic conjunctivitis . acular also indicated treatment postoperative inflammation patients undergone cataract extraction .
contraindications: temporary relief ocular itching due seasonal allergic conjunctivitis , apply one drop acular affected eye ( ) four times day . treatment postoperative inflammation patients undergone cataract extraction , apply one drop acular affected eye four times daily beginning 24 hours cataract surgery continuing first 2 weeks postoperative period . ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions: acular ( ketorolac tromethamine ophthalmic solution ) 0.5 % supplied sterile , white opaque plastic ( ldpe ) bottles white droppers , gray high impact polystyrene ( hips ) caps follows : 5 ml 10 ml bottle ndc 0023-2181-05 storage : store 15°c 25°c ( 59°f 77°f ) . protect light .
adverseReactions: acular solution contraindicated patients previously demonstrated hypersensitivity ingredients formulation [ ( 6.1 ) ] .
indications_original: ACULAR is indicated for the temporary relief of ocular itching due to seasonal allergic conjunctivitis. ACULAR is also indicated for the treatment of postoperative inflammation in patients who have undergone cataract extraction.
contraindications_original: For temporary relief of ocular itching due to seasonal allergic conjunctivitis, apply one drop of ACULAR to the affected eye(s) four times a day. For the treatment of postoperative inflammation in patients who have undergone cataract extraction, apply one drop of ACULAR to the affected eye four times daily beginning 24 hours after cataract surgery and continuing through the first 2 weeks of the postoperative period. ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
ACULAR (ketorolac tromethamine ophthalmic solution) 0.5% is supplied sterile, in white opaque plastic (LDPE) bottles with white droppers, with gray high impact polystyrene (HIPS) caps as follows:
                  5 mL in 10 mL bottle 
		     
	
		     
	NDC 0023-2181-05
                  
                     Storage: Store at 15°C to 25°C (59°F to 77°F). Protect from light.
